text: Luigi Franza (24 February 1939 - 19 October 2020) was an Italian politician and lawyer. Franza was a member of the Italian Democratic Socialist Party. Franza was a member of the Italian Senate between 1983 and 1994. Franza died on 19 October 2020 in Ariano Irpino, Italy at the age of 81.Muore il senatore Luigi Franza ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Campania Category:Italian lawyers
title: Luigi Franza
